title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 335.2 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 335.2 - Definition

State Regulations
A continuing appointment shall be an appointment to a
position of academic rank which shall not be affected by changes in such rank
and shall continue until resignation, retirement or
termination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
335.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
